column4: I made a mistake by installing realplayer twice.. what i did was install realplayer and then tried tor run, and it didn't work, and installed it once again.  . and then i was struck on the head for I forget to restart the GUI. .  how can I uninstall programs (or realplayer, in my case) in ubuntu? thanks inadvance
was it an debian package from ftp.nerim.net that you installed?
yes, debian packages, but not arbitrarily-installed software
